name: Rushing Food & An Old School Party
name_original: Rushing Food & An Old School Party
description:
Rushing Food & An Old School Party ( On A Fabulous One Night Miracle)

      

this game will give you a role of a waiter/waitress for serving the food to everyone who come to enjoy the food (and left the party if they done).  So go on! , don't let them die for hungry in this party. And Every one here have a different  patience Shh h...... 

Information about this game:

This game is a part of an event:  Game Jam From Home Them - Old School Party.  To create the game in 48 hours.  This game is a simple prototype ,  you can take an idea  and develop  in a new game.

Controller:

Key broad -  W,A,S,D  / Arrow Axis  for moving character.

E - Drop/Pick item in hand.

Q - Remove item in hand.

ESC - Pause the game.

Team Develop  - UhmYesYes
